DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess intervention manual therapy motor control exercise combine inspiratory muscle train program effective inspiratory muscle train program alone increase maximum inspiratory pressure patient asthma . In addition , study pretend evaluate change cause intervention regard possible postural change thoracic diameter .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Manual Therapy Respiratory Muscle Training Maximal Inspiratory Pressure Patients With Asthma
DOC.criteria: Asthmatics subject age 18 65 year Were exclude participant present neurologic , psychiatric cognitive pathology difficult cooperation , inflammatory disease cervical spine and/or severe orthopedic problem difficult daily activity , history thoracic surgery , vertebral fracture , abnormal thorax radiography , spinal thoracic structure musculoskeletal disorder present contraindication treatment technique ( e.g . ostheophorosis ) . In case exacerbation asthma , miss one treatment session and/or appear contraindication continue treatment routine six week study patient also exclude .
